title: Mekor Shabbat with the Sachers | Mekor 3
description: Join us at Mekor Habracha for an inspiring and insightful Shabbat with Ari and Dr. Tova Sacher.
ogTitle: Mekor Shabbat with the Sachers | Mekor 3
ogDescription: Join us at Mekor Habracha for an inspiring and insightful Shabbat with Ari and Dr. Tova Sacher.
twitterTitle: Mekor Shabbat with the Sachers | Mekor 3
twitterDescription: Join us at Mekor Habracha for an inspiring and insightful Shabbat with Ari and Dr. Tova Sacher.
text: Skip to Main Content Membership Events Donate Kiddush Center City Beit Midrash Join Us Davening Who We Are Kosher Restaurants More Support Mekor Mekor Shabbat with the Sachers Fri, Oct 31 | 1500 Walnut St #206, Philadelphia, PA 19102, USA Registration is closed See other events Time & Location Oct 31, 2025, 7:00 PM – Nov 01, 2025, 11:00 PM 1500 Walnut St #206, Philadelphia, PA 19102, USA About The Event Ari Sacher is a Rocket Scientist who has worked in the design and development of missile defense for over thirty years (including the Iron Dome and new generation of laser defenses). He has briefed hundreds of US lawmakers on Israeli Missile Defense and Israeli-US Defense collaboration, including multiple briefings on Capitol Hill at the invitation of the House Majority Leader and the Israeli Ambassador to the U.S. Share This Event Mekor Habracha Center City Synagogue (215) 525-4246 admin@mekorhabracha.org ​ 1500 Walnut St Suite 206 Philadelphia, PA 19102 SUBSCRIBE TO OUR WEEKLY NEWSLETTER Enter your email here SUBSCRIBE Latest Newsletters Copyright ©2025 by Mekor Habracha Synagogue
